item.title: Cluster comparisons with ARI
item.description: Future home of an actual tutorial.

item.title: A short introduction
item.description: In a way, this is just a post to baptise the website. What I plan to do here from now on is to share snippets of what I’ve learned, read, or listened to lately (with a small dose of personal experiences), in hopes to both consolidate my knowledge and potentially help others. In a way, the picture of Boston in the header just represents that the overarching theme will be anything that has happened since I moved here for grad school (so yes, learning, reading, and listening to music mostly).
